basics.name: Zelda Cole
basics.summary: I am studying for a M.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

work.summary: Content creator and event manager for University of Hawaii Esports
highlights: Actively engage with community members and players, and team leads to create content, build relationships, and ensure player support
Collaborate with the GFX, broadcast, and content teams to create and implement strategies for in-person and social media content to increase community engagement across various platforms

work.summary: Recieved 2 months of mentorship to learn fundamentals of esports culture to enhance global fan engagement through innovative content, marketing strategies, and events
highlights: Developed over 10 Meta paid advertising strategies for Gen.G's Global Academy Play Services, increasing reach in English-speaking markets and boosting fan-base and student enrollment.
Collaborated with the CGO in an agile environment to execute a marketing sprint, resulting in 20 western sales for YOUR.GG VOD review.
Created social media content for gen.G Academy International and Gen.G Gold to engage Western audiences.

work.summary: Led the redesign of mobile/web responsive laundry startup to finalize an MVP for potential investors
highlights: Collaborated with project partners, PMs, clients, and Scrum masters in an agile environment to ensure project success.
Seamlessly integrate interactions between both web and mobile platforms.
Conducted user research and usability testing sessions achieving a successful task completion rate of 90%.

work.summary: Manage architecture projects and community development plans.
highlights: Produced high-quality architectural drawings and presentation materials for 20+ projects, ensuring clear communication of design ideas to team members, clients, and contractors.
Collaborated with clients and team members throughout the entirety of projects, from conception to completion, resulting in successful project delivery
